column4: hi, i have a problem with my network un gutsy. it worked in feisty and it worked when i upgraded from feisty to gutsy, but not when i do a clean install. anyone know how to fix it?
can you see your modem but not connect to it?
it recognices my networkcard, but in the networ-manager it only shows me 0.0.0.0 as ip
it shows that its connected to it
